channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX4][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 54B20
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 14, 05:30 - 07:00 UTC

Oct 24, 23:31 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Baremetal offer.

Start time : 14/11/2024 05:30 UTC
End time : 14/11/2024 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack 54B20 will be unreachable during the maintenance
Service improvement :As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will move servers from rack 54B20 to rack 54B22

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX8][Dedicated Servers] - Racks R807R19 - R807R20
item.description:
Nov 3, 18:16 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 03/11/2024 16:11 UTC
End time : 03/11/2024 16:21 UTC
Service impact : IPMI service was temporarily unavailable on servers in racks R807R19 - R807R20.
Root cause : This incident was due to cooling system issue.
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

item.title: [BHS1][Dedicated Servers] - Racks T02E04 - T02E13 - T02E17 - T02E18 - T02E24 - T02E27 - T02E34 - T02E41
item.description:
Nov 3, 16:28 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Nov 3, 14:35 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Nov 3, 14:24 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our Bare Metal offer. It has temporarily affected the functionality.


We are actively working to resolve this problem.

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.


We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.


Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 03/11/2024 13:51 UTC
Service impact : vRack network are temporarily unavailable on servers in racks T02E04 - T02E13 - T02E17 - T02E18 - T02E24 - T02E27 - T02E34 - T02E41.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [SBG5][DedicatedServers] SBG0502B08B
item.description:
Nov 3, 06:58 UTC

End time : 03/11/2024 06:40 UTC
Service impact : Network bandwidth was reduced for customers with LACP (Link Aggregation Control Protocol) activated .
Public/vRack were cut for those who have not enabled it
Root cause : A network equipment caused the incident
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

item.title: [WAW1][Dedicated Servers] - Multiple servers down notification
item.description:
Nov 2, 09:11 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 02/11/2024 06:11 UTC
End time : 02/11/2024 07:58 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in WAW datacenter were temporarily unavailable.
Root cause : A reboot was needed to solve the incident
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Nov 2, 07:58 UTC
Monitoring - Service impact : No impact is being observed for servers in WAW1
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Nov 2, 06:34 UTC

Please be aware that this is currently affecting the availability.

Here is detail for this incident :

Service impact : Some servers in WAW datacenter are temporarily unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Investigating

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.
